name: 范書愷
objective:
針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the management related journal papers. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.
schedule:
Week 1: Course introduction and seminar grouping
Weeks 2-18: Personal and Group Presentation of Academic Journal Papers
scorePolicy:
1. Oral Presentations 50%
2. Written Reports 30%
3. Class Participation 20%

If the students need to ask leave for class, they should be approved by the instructor in advance.
materials:
Journal Papers published within most recent 3 years
SCI/SSCI indexed
All the papers published in pure OA journals should not be considered
